content: Investments FSMOne Fundsupermart Asked by AnonymousAsked 4w agoCan I subscribe to IPOs on Fundsupermart without a CDP account?I read online that you need a CDP account to subscribe to an IPO, but in the Fundsupermart FAQs, there were instructions on how to do so, without any mention of a CDP account. Does anyone have any experience doing so through Fundsupermart?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Cedric Jamie Soh, Director at Seniorcare.com.sgTop Contributor (Sep)Level 7. Grand MasterAnswered 4w agoNo, you can't. You need a CDP account to apply for an IPO.Hope this Seedly post helps you in applying CDP https://blog.seedly.sg/step-step-guide-opening-stock-trading-brokerage-cdp-account-singapore/0 comments0
